channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.description:
Report X-2023100724

item.description:
Report X-2023100453

  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. CONTAINED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE BY DESIGNATED RESPONDER. PACKAGE WAS THEN PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR ORGANIC PEROXIDES.

item.title: Report X-2023100586
item.description:
Report X-2023100586

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-29
  • City: BOYLSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box found leaking. Box placed into bucket and taken down to QA cage for inspection. DescribePack: Bottom of box wet. 1 bottle broken into several pieces. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed box into bucket and taken to QA cage for inspection, and placed rags under box to absorb liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023100435
item.description:
Report X-2023100435

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERD IN A TRAILER BY THE UNLOADER. HE STOPPED UNLOADING, HE LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. RESPONDER, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, PLACED THE PACKAGE INTO A LINED DMP SPILL TUB. THE AREA AND EQUIPMENT WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE EQUIPMENT DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN BROUGHT TO THE DMP WORKSTATION. IT WAS THEN DETERMANED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE UPS HAZRDOUS MATERIAL HELP DESK.

item.title: Report X-2023091111
item.description:
Report X-2023091111

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE NOTICED PACKAGE HAD A TEAR WHICH EXPOSED A LITHIUM ION BATTERY WITH NO UN LITHIUM BATTERY LABEL. RESPONDER CALLED HAZMAT HELP DESK FOR UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2023100352
item.description:
Report X-2023100352

  • City: MIDDLEBORO
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA due to a smell and being wet at the corner of the package DescribePack: The one gallon container was on its side and looked to be leaking from the top cap closure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a lined salvage drum and the one gallon container was place upright.

item.title: Report X-2023090217
item.description:
Report X-2023090217

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T00:32:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: FRAMINGHAM
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On Aug 29th, 3 bottles containing Isopropyl alcohol were discovered at the express station leaking. They are only intended for ground movement and have not entered an aircraft. There is no indications on the outside of the package that it contains dangerous goods. The 3 packages that leaked are what let FedEx Express know that they contained dangerous goods.
